title: Target

steps.hint: Welcome to Make Art. Let’s get started. **Type** `circle 250`.
When you are done typing your line, press ENTER on your keyboard. Now let’s set the drawing color to white - on the second line **type** `color white`
To cut out a hole in the larger circle, we can make a smaller circle. **Type** `circle 200`
Let’s keep going here. We can make a target design with another circle. Set the drawing color to black. **Type** `color black`
Again, to cut out this smaller circle, we can use another white circle with `color white`

completion_text: Well done! You’ve made your first design with code. But oh, doesn't this look a bit dull? Try changing the color in order to: red, yellow, green, blue, magenta. That’s better.
